description: A junior tech reaches out in panic after family records disappear; a brief, intense exchange at Bar 101 spurs the decision. The update that randomizes public identities is set in motion.
Citizens begin noticing unfamiliar names and records—panic spreads, but transit and essential systems keep working despite the confusion.
Council factions clash over the identity crisis, as protests and detentions mount; technical teams scramble to restore order while official messaging attempts to calm the public.
